subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: France’s World Cup hopes were hurt as the winger Franck Ribéry pulled out of the tournament after failing to overcome a back injury that has bothered him for several weeks.
snippet: France’s World Cup hopes were hurt as the winger Franck Ribéry pulled out of the tournament after failing to overcome a back injury that has bothered him for several weeks.
